speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, following my remarks and those of the Republican leader, if he chooses to make some, there will be a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each. As previously announced, there will be no rollcall votes today. Senators should be prepared to vote tomorrow at about 2:15 p.m. or thereabouts on the motion to invoke cloture on the motion to proceed to H.R. 3221, the legislative vehicle for the housing bill.
